bioAsHtml:
Software developer at Codeborne, Tallinn, Estonia.

15+y experience of developing enterprise software (internet-banks, e-commerce, background screening) with TDD and other XP practices. Berserk fan of clean code.

Author of open-source projects selenide.org, play-tests, pdf-test, xls-test.

acceptedTalks.title: Selenide: concise UI Tests in Java.
Selenide: concise UI Tests in Java. From developers for developers.
